song_lyrics: Satsangmā sahu āvajo re, sahu āvajo re,
Agnān tamane dūr karīne, gnān-tej relanār,
Shuddha thavā sau āvajo re... Pramukh Swāmī chhe 1
Pāmar patitane pūrṇa karīne, muktapad denār,
Adharmī janne dayā karīne, dharma-panthe lenār,
Bhakta thavā sahu āvajo re... Pramukh Swāmī chhe 2
Unmatta indriyo vash karīne, harimad āpanār,
Mast thavā sahu āvajo re... Pramukh Swāmī chhe 3
Aṭaḷ āsakti ṭāḷī karīne, shaktinā dātār,
Akṣhare javā sahu āvajo re... Pramukh Swāmī chhe 4
title: Satsangmā sahu āvajo re sahu āvajo re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1112: Sadhu Bhaktipriyadas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
